messages.message: normally I'd spend some time trying to figure this out myself and then double check what I find, but cap1 needs an answer fairly quick:

> Is it possible to import a module from another python script in instabase? I'm able to do it locally on my machine, but am running into issues trying to do this in instabase.
> *Both python files are in the same directory
>
> Another question related to this topic:
> Is it possible to use the python file handler open() command to load other files in instabase?
I'm thinking the `open()` question is probably yeah can do but I'm not totally sure on that either.
let me verify. I reckon they're not and just have scripts on the fs
afaik itâ€™s not possible to import libraries across scripts (but i might be wrong)
oh shoot misread the question haha thought you were just trying to open a file
